video.title: Episodes
video.synopsis: Hoping to create an American version of their hit British sitcom, two screenwriters run into cultural obstacles, starting with the lead character.

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Beverly are shocked when they arrive in California to discover that their star has been replaced by the network with Matt LeBlanc.
episodes.title: Episode One

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Beverly attend a swanky dinner party at Merc's house, where Sean falls prey to Matt's flattery and attention.
episodes.title: Episode Two

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Matt spend a day bonding with a trip to Las Vegas, leaving Beverly feeling left out of her husband's new "bromance."
episodes.title: Episode Three

episodes.synopsis: Forced to rescue a drunken Matt from a seedy dive bar so that he won't drive drunk, Sean and Beverly take him to his ex-wife's house.
episodes.title: Episode Four

episodes.synopsis: Matt invites both Sean and Morning, an actress with whom Sean has long been infatuated, to a charity event where Sean learns the attraction is mutual.
episodes.title: Episode Five

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that her husband's relationship with Morning is less than platonic, Beverly packs her bags and leaves the house.
episodes.title: Episode Six

episodes.synopsis: Deeply regretting an impulsive tryst, Beverly returns home to Sean as they wrap production of their series and prepare to return to London.
episodes.title: Episode Seven

episodes.synopsis: In the Season 2 premiere, Sean and Beverly prepare for the "Pucks" series premiere, but their marital woes create an awkward work environment.
episodes.title: Episode One

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Beverly, stunned about the latest ratings, are shocked even further when Matt gives them each an expensive gift. Jamie asks Matt for a favor.
episodes.title: Episode Two

episodes.synopsis: Following the death of Merc's dad, Sean, Beverly and Matt argue about how to pay their respects. Matt tells of his first celebrity sexual encounter.
episodes.title: Episode Three

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Beverly are forced to tweak their latest script after Carol presents some troubling research. As a result, Matt debates quitting the show.
episodes.title: Episode Four

episodes.synopsis: Carol, desperate for a commitment from Merc, pressures him to plan a vacation, but things get crazy when Jamie plans a separate trip for her and Matt.
episodes.title: Episode Five

episodes.synopsis: Merc asks Matt to persuade one of his "Friends" costars to make a guest appearance on "Pucks!" -- a task that proves surprisingly difficult.
episodes.title: Episode Six

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Beverly have to address a delicate issue with Matt: his expanding waistline, which the network blames for the show's declining ratings.
episodes.title: Episode Seven

episodes.synopsis: Merc fights for his career after canceling a show that is now a monster hit on another network. Matt has a one-night stand with his stalker.
episodes.title: Episode Eight

episodes.synopsis: Upon receiving a "Man of the Year" award, Merc discovers Jamie's affair with Matt; Sean is stricken when Beverly brings Rob to the ceremony.
episodes.title: Episode Nine

episodes.synopsis: Matt continues to fight for custody of his children, trying to convince his ex-wife to forgive him for sleeping with his stalker.
episodes.title: Episode One

episodes.synopsis: Matt's DUI complicates his custody suit, while Sean can't bring himself to forgive Beverly for her latest affair. Carol meets her charismatic boss.
episodes.title: Episode Two

episodes.synopsis: Matt is desperate to get out of his "Pucks!" contract for a new opportunity, but he's thwarted by Carol's ambition and a rivalry between the writers.
episodes.title: Episode Three

episodes.synopsis: Matt's appearance on "The Tonight Show with Jay Leno" isn't the success he had hoped for, and Merc hits a snag when he tries to pitch some new shows.
episodes.title: Episode Four

episodes.synopsis: Life is topsy-turvy when Sean and Beverly wind up with the wrong therapist, the show's future is in doubt and Matt is forced to help a friend.
episodes.title: Episode Five

episodes.synopsis: When "Pucks!" is pulled from the schedule, Beverly is happy to contemplate moving back to England, but Sean and Matt have very different reactions.
episodes.title: Episode Six

episodes.synopsis: Sean is desperate to stay in Hollywood and tries to get Beverly on board, while Matt is crushed that his former stalker no longer cares about him.
episodes.title: Episode Seven

episodes.synopsis: As filming on "Pucks!" draws to a close, a false rumor might give Matt a big opportunity, and Carol and Beverly wrangle over a possible new show.
episodes.title: Episode Eight

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is pulled in different directions as Beverly tries to keep Sean on track for a return to London, and Matt is asked to audition for a drama.
episodes.title: Episode Nine

episodes.synopsis: A funeral is a nightmare for Matt, who learns the dearly departed embezzled all his money. Sean and Beverly are reluctantly dragged back to Hollywood.
episodes.title: Episode One

episodes.synopsis: While Matt has difficulty facing up to the realities of his money problems, Sean and Beverly meet with several networks to discuss their new show.
episodes.title: Episode Two

episodes.synopsis: Unexpected romance is in the air for both Matt and Carol. An old writing partner of Sean's turns up like a bad penny.
episodes.title: Episode Three

episodes.synopsis: Beverly and Sean learn about their little legal problem with Tim. Matt may have found an unorthodox way out of his money problems.
episodes.title: Episode Four

episodes.synopsis: Carol's love life gets a jolt after Merc reveals something about himself and Helen. A dubious money-making venture starts to make sense to Matt.
episodes.title: Episode Five

episodes.synopsis: When Matt's father goes into the hospital, he drags Sean and Beverly along for support. Meanwhile, Beverly has to field calls from a panicky Carol.
episodes.title: Episode Six

episodes.synopsis: With everyone heaping praise on their new show, Sean still craves Matt's approval, until it comes in an unexpected way. Helen is turning possessive.
episodes.title: Episode Seven

episodes.synopsis: Matt considers career options after getting a reality check from a potential young buyer for his Malibu house. Beverly faces Helen's crazy hostility.
episodes.title: Episode Eight

episodes.synopsis: Matt turns testy after reluctantly starting his new game show, Beverly and Sean get shocking news about their sitcom, and Carol makes a decision.
episodes.title: Episode Nine

episodes.synopsis: Matt has mixed feelings about the success of his show "The Box." Sean and Beverly get a taste of life with Tim in charge.
episodes.title: Episode One

episodes.synopsis: Matt finds himself at the center of an enormous scandal. Tensions rise for Sean and Beverly at a casting session with Tim.
episodes.title: Episode Two

episodes.synopsis: Matt leverages his newfound celebrity for an "in" with the networks, then turns his attention to wooing Sean and Beverly back.
episodes.title: Episode Three

episodes.synopsis: Beverly finds herself in an awkward position with Carol. Matt takes Sean and Beverly to his ranch for a weekend of creative brainstorming.
episodes.title: Episode Four

episodes.synopsis: Carol makes an earth-shattering announcement. A reluctant Sean and Beverly help Matt with a problem that's painfully personal.
episodes.title: Episode Five

episodes.synopsis: Sean and Beverly pitch their new show to Helen. But dark clouds are hovering over their professional relationship with Matt.
episodes.title: Episode Six

episodes.synopsis: In the face of extreme Hollywood absurdity, Sean and Beverly are forced to confront Matt -- and plot their next move.
episodes.title: Episode Seven
